name: Warmth (itch) (grizz180)
description:
I made this in 2 days and I am a little new to programming. This is a pretty fun time killer and is pretty difficult, (Insane mode is best).My high scores were,

(easy  - 2:59,  Hard  -  2:02,  Insane -  54)

Please make sure you play insane!!!!!!

and remember to comment your high scores!!!
